prodNameC: 貝克曼庫爾特賽特斯/庫爾特 克隆 CD3(IgG1)-FITC/ B4-RD1
prodNameE: Beckman Coulter Cyto-Stat/Coulter Clone CD3(IgG1)-FITC/ B4-RD1
ingredientsDesc:
CLONES：UCHT1[CD3(IgG1)] from BALB/c mice immunized with human infant thymocytes .89B(B4) from BALB/c mice immunized with tumor cells.
Ig CHAIN：Mouse IgG1
CYTOTOXICTY：None by direct lysis
SOURCE：Conditioned culture medium
PURIFICATION：Affinity chromatography
CONJUGATION：CD3(IgG1)-FITC, B4-RD1
MOLAR RATIO ：FITC/Protein-3-6
                          RD1/Protein-0.5-1.5
FLUORESCENCE：
        FITC (Green)   Excites at 468-509 nm
                            Emits at 504-541 nm
      RD1 (Orange)  Excites at 468-575 nm
                            Emits at 568-590 nm
The concentration of nonantibody reagents in 0.5 mL(1 vial) is 0.2% BSA, 0.01 M potassium phosphate, 0.15 M NaCl, 0.1% NaN3.
applicantName: 美商貝克曼庫爾特有限公司台灣分公司
applicantAddr: 台北市大安區敦化南路二段216號8樓
efficacy: 用流氏細胞儀在全血樣品中對總CD3+(T)細胞和總CD19+(B)細胞進行同步識別和計數。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: B 血液學及病理學用裝置
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: B.5220 自動區別細胞計數器
